channel.title: Timer

item.title: Timer
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

Well, i got this code for when u use a tinderbox with logs:

    if (itemUsed == 590 && useWith == 1511 ) {
				createGroundItem(4653, absX, absY, 1);
				createGroundItem(1511, absX, absY, 1);
				deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1);
				startAnimation(733);
				addSkillXP(30, 11);
			}

But how can i do that it will turn to ashes in like 45 seconds?

Read full topic
